name: European Federation of Tourist Guide Associations
goal: To defend the interests of Tourist Guides in Europe and promote higher standards for tourist guides training and CPD, to organise seminars, conventions and networking events for tourism, accessibility and sustainability
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Enterprise, Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives: Modernisation of Directive on Recognition of Professional Qualifications, Services Directive, Collaborative Economy, Accessible Tourism
